required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Pitavastatin/Fenofibrate in Complex-dyslipidemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blinded, Parallel, Therapeutic Confirmatory Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Pitavastatin Versus Pitavastatin/Fenofibrate in Complex-dyslipidemia Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Pitavastatin versus Pitavastatin/Fenofibrate in complex-dyslipidemia patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the efficacy of the Pitavastatin/Fenofibrate in complex-dyslipidemia patients by the reduction of non-HDL-Cholesterol levels compared with Pitavastatin.

primary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of Non-HDL Cholesterol
primary_outcome.description: Change rate of Non-HDL-C after 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of Non-HDL Cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of Non-HDL-C after 4 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of LDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of LDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of HDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of LDL-C/HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of LDL-C/HDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of TC/HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of TC/HDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of non-HDL-C/HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of non-HDL-C/HDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of VLDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of VLDL-C after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of TG
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of TG after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of TC
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of TC after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of Apo Al
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of Apo Al after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of Apo B
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of Apo B change after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of Apo Al/Apo B
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of Apo Al/Apo B after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of fibrinogen
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of fibrinogen after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean percentage change of hs-CRP
secondary_outcome.description: Change rate of hs-CRP after 4 and 8 weeks compared to baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: Achievement rate(%) of treatment goals after 4 weeks and 8 weeks

arm_group.description: Fenofibrate pellet (as micronized fenofibrate 160mg) and Pitavastatin Ca 2mg once a day

intervention.description: Fenofibrate pellet (as micronized fenofibrate 160mg) and Pitavastatin Ca 2mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- High risk patient to Coronary Heart Disease
- At visit 1(Screening)
1. If treated with Pitavastatin 2mg monotherapy 4 weeks prior to this study : LDL-C<100mg/dL and 150mg/dL≤TG<500mg/dL, randomize without run-in period
2. If non treated with Pitavastatin 2mg monotherapy 4 weeks prior to this study : LDL-C≥100mg/dL and 150mg/dL≤TG<500mg/dL, treatment of Pitavastatin 2mg for 4 weeks(run-in period)
- LDL-C<100mg/dL and 150mg/dL≤TG<500mg/dL after 4 weeks of Pitavastatin 2mg monotherapy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject with acute artery disease
- Subject with congestive heart failure(NYHA class III~IV) or uncontrolled arrhythmia
- Secondary or iatrogenic dyslipidemia caused by hypothyroidism, nephrotic syndrome etc.
- AST or ALT > 2XULN, Serum Creatinine > 2.5mg/dL, Creatinine phosphokinase > 2XULN
- Subject with gall bladder disease or pancreatitis
- Uncontrolled hypertension
- Endocrine or metabolic disease affected on serum lipid or liprotein
- Subject with medical history of myopathy or rhabdomyolysis caused by Statin treatment, hereditary myopathy or family history
- Not eligible to participate for the study at the discretion of investigator
